readable.title: 3474265683_43b1033d94
readable.content: A man and woman in a crowd of people are having a verbal exchange . A man in a blue sweater , black leather jacket and gray hat is surrounded by people . A man wearing a shirt and tie , looks perplexed as he navigates through a crowd . an old wearing a grey hat and a leather jacket surrounded by several other people . Man wearing hat , cardigan , and tie in a crowd of people
